title: Bouncing ball heights
description: Write a function `compute_heights` that returns a list of the maximum heights of the ball after each bounce, until either n bounces or the height falls below h1. The function should take h_0, h_1, n as keyword arguments, with defaults 1.0, 0.3, 10.
hints: Use a loop to simulate each bounce.
Stop if the height falls below h1 before n bounces.
Include the initial height in the result.
